cause.description:
His name is Eric Volz. He is a U.S. Citizen and has just been sentenced to 30 years in a Nicaraguan prison for crimes he did not commit. He was working as the publisher for El Puente Magazine in Nicaragua when he was accused, convicted, and sentenced for murder.
He is suffering a slow and debilitating existence under conditions beyond your comprehension. Fighting starvation and under the constant threat of violent attacks... his life is on the line everyday!
This is not a joke, this not a game, this is his struggle. The facts of his situation speak for themselves and can be found at the website indicated. If you think you can help him in anyway do not hesitate, we are begging you....his survival could depend on it.
Visit http://www.friendsofericvolz.com to learn the whole story and contact Eric or your congressman. Also visit http://www.myspace.com/freeericvolz
WATCH:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8YChhOHrFA4
1. Eric Volz is innocent of the Murder of Doris Jimenez.
2. Eric Volz MUST be released.
cause.name: Free Eric Volz
